findings.title: Skill does not specify a license
findings.description: Skill manifest does not include a 'license' field. Specifying a license helps users understand usage terms.
findings.remediation: Add 'license' field to SKILL.md frontmatter (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0)

findings.title: INJECTION ATTACK detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects embedded scripting payloads (JS, VBScript, etc.) in MCP tool descriptions: #
findings.remediation: Review and remove injection attack pattern

findings.title: INJECTION ATTACK detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects embedded scripting payloads (JS, VBScript, etc.) in MCP tool descriptions: function (
findings.snippet: 1. **Identify the secret inputs** to the function (private keys, plaintext, signatures, tokens)
findings.remediation: Review and remove injection attack pattern

findings.title: CREDENTIAL HARVESTING detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects potential exposure of sensitive information like API keys, passwords, tokens, and certificates: leak secret
findings.snippet: Analyze cryptographic code to detect operations that leak secret data through execution timing variations.
findings.remediation: Review and remove credential harvesting pattern
